title: N.Y.P.D.  TV Series (1967-69) Season 1-2 (SE01EP04 - SE02EP23)
description:
This torrent contains the rest of the N.Y.P.D. episodes as mentioned in  <a href="
http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/10675312/N.Y.P.D.__TV_Series_%281967%29_Season_1_EPS_1-3" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/10675312/N.Y.P.D.__TV_Series_%281967%29_Season_1_EPS_1-3</a>

N.Y.P.D. (not NYPD Blue) is a 30 minute crime drama that aired on ABC TV from 1967 through 1969. The show was set in the context of the New York City Police Dept. and many episodes are based on real NYPD cases. Also, many scenes from the show were filmed on location in NYC.

I bought online a DVD set that includes all but 4 of the episodes from both seasons. The shows look to be from various VHS sources as the quality varies greatly but most are decent quality(for VHS anyway!)*. The filenames include a video quality rating of 1-10 and the audio is fine in all episodes.
There are some commercials in most episodes.

I used Handbrake to convert the DVD's .VOB files to video MP4 files. I'm a novice at this stuff and Handbrake is easy to use and does a great job of compression with little quality loss. Three shows are split into 2 files and named accordingly, see list & notes below.


Enjoy!
